tidbits.title: Luxurious Charm
tidbits.description: Saint Barthélemy, known as St. Barts, attracts jet-setters and travelers seeking luxury with its upscale resorts, designer boutiques, and pristine beaches.

tidbits.title: French-Caribbean Fusion
tidbits.description: This island blends French sophistication with Caribbean charm, evident in its cuisine, where haute cuisine meets local flavors in exquisite dishes.

tidbits.title: Gustavia's Harbor
tidbits.description: The capital, Gustavia, boasts a picturesque harbor filled with yachts and sailboats, offering a vibrant nightlife and upscale dining experiences.
